column4: is there a difference between installing with apt-get and installing with the software center?
ubuntu-bug gedit if you want to submit to Ubuntu
ubuntu-bug is the program to report bugs/issues to Ubuntu.  It requires the package name after it, in this case gedit
is it ok to sumbit to ubuntu or do I need to submit to gedit directly?
? either is probably fine, if it's a bug - it should move upstream
oh sorry misread - but scripts/bins in that directory
maybe I need to login again?
if you just created the ~/bin directory - log out / back in and try the "echo $PATH" again
cgroza: qin: after login again "test.sh" works
